SuperstitioMod:VulnerableTogetherRelic.NAME: Down Together
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a #ysuperstitiomod:Mutual Downfall to your hand.

SuperstitioMod:MasochismMode.NAME: Masochistic
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d point(s) of #ysuperstitiomod:Pleasure for every #b%d HP lost in a single hit. NL On #ysuperstitiomod:Orgasm, remove #b%d #rCorruption.

SuperstitioMod:DevaBody_Masochism.NAME: Corrupted Vengance Deva
DESCRIPTIONS: You no longer lose HP from any other source. NL When you would lose HP, gain #rCorruption instead. NL At end of turn, #ysuperstitiomod:Embrace Corruption for each #ysuperstitiomod:Fresh Corruption. NL All #rCorruption is cleared at the end of combat.
SuperstitioMod:DevaBody_Masochism.FLAVOR: Your body heals in an instant... but the sensations leave their mark.

SuperstitioMod:EnjoyAilment.NAME: Savor the Pain
DESCRIPTIONS: While #yWeakened, increase card-based #rCorruption removal and #yBlock gained by #b1/%d. NL While #yFrail, increase damage dealt by #b1/%d. NL While #yVulnerable, increase card-based #rCorruption removal and #yBlock gained by #b1/%d and damage dealt by #b1/%d.
